title: [Large-Scale] ADDIE-Based Task-Centered Learning Model Development for Fashion Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic garment construction skills and material understanding
context.additional_context: Learners participate in real-time video classes using personal devices, monitoring learning outcomes through real-time feedback and formative assessments

learning_goals: Explain the costume education task design process using the five phases of the ADDIE model
Develop costume-making practical tasks tailored to learner proficiency levels using task-based learning approaches
Formative assessment tools can achieve over 85% effectiveness in the learning process.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
